p: We compared the simulated annual NEE for the period 1981–2010 with reported values of the C sink of Finnish forests ( Official Statistics of Finland, 2019). The simulated stemwood growth values for the period 2009–2012 were compared to observed forest growth for the same period. The simulated VAPstart days were compared to estimates based on webcam images ( Arslan et al., 2017; Peltoniemi et al., 2018a, b), as well as to those estimated from satellite observations (SYKE Vegetation Phenology 2001–2017).
